body_html: user_ops_op_lib will only apply the :framework dep to sources it collects. If you define your own cc_library rule you'll need to add the required deps explicitly. You should be able to just add deps = ["//tensorflow/core:framework"].
body_text: user_ops_op_lib will only apply the :framework dep to sources it collects. If you define your own cc_library rule you'll need to add the required deps explicitly. You should be able to just add deps = ["//tensorflow/core:framework"].
body: user_ops_op_lib will only apply the :framework dep to sources it collects. If you define your own cc_library rule you'll need to add the required deps explicitly. You should be able to just add `deps = ["//tensorflow/core:framework"]`.
